oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crystal structure of 4,6-O-ethylidene-N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene)-β-D-glucopyranosylamine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SAH, AJAY K
RAO, CHEBROLU P
SAARENKETO, PAULI K
KARI RISSANEN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: crystal structure
single crystals
synthesis (chemical)
x-ray diffraction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 4,6-O-Ethylidene-N-(2-hydroxybenzylidene)-β-D-glucopyranosylamine was synthesized and characterized using analytical, spectral and single-crystal X-ray diffraction methods. The anomeric nature of the saccharide moiety was proposed based on 1H NMR studies and was confirmed by the crystal structure. The lattice structure of this compound was compared with that of its analogues.
